mapper.select: SELECT id as id, hyname as hyname, nickname as nickname, phoneNum as phoneNum, email as email FROM member
SELECT id as id, hyname as hyname, nickname as nickname, phoneNum as phoneNum, email as email FROM member where id=#{id}

SELECT id as id, hyname as hyname, nickname as nickname, phoneNum as phoneNum, email as email FROM member where hyname like concat(concat('%',#{hyname},'%')) or nickname like concat(concat('%',#{nickname},'%')) or phoneNum like concat(concat('%',#{phoneNum},'%')) or email like concat(concat('%',#{email},'%'))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( hyname, nickname, phoneNum, email ) VALUES ( #{hyname},#{nickname},#{phoneNum},#{email} )
